item.title: How this site is built
item.description: I currently use hugo, a static site generator. I write content in markdown, and hugo publishes it as HTML. To do hosting custom domain I used nameboy to help choose a domain bought and managed via netlify, $12/year HTTPS with auto cert renewal test branch preview favicon check: rss reader can read site? Tooling requirements Here’s what I want in a blogging tool, and how hugo provides.
